def: a small computer you can carry
ex: I read books on my tablet.

def: a set of keys for typing
ex: Type your name on the keyboard.

def: a device to fill a battery with power
ex: Plug in your charger at night.

def: a device to listen to sound quietly
ex: Wear headphones to listen to music.

def: a program on a phone or tablet
to get something from the internet
ex: Download the file to your computer.

def: to send something to the internet
ex: Upload your photo to the website.

def: the flat part you look at on a device
to make something newer or better
ex: Update your app for new features.

def: a tool to move the pointer on a computer
